author: Staff Reporter
text:
A 27-year-old power loom worker was killed on the spot in a multiple vehicle collision involving two private engineering college buses, a two-wheeler and a commercial autorickshaw in Magudanchavadi here on Tuesday.

Loganathan of K.K. Nagar in Magudanchavadi, who got married 10 days ago, was accompanying his friend Prabhu (22) in an autorickshaw and was on their way to Salem. While nearing K.K. Nagar bus stop, they found students boarding a college bus and hence they waited in the rear side of the bus. In the meantime, another bus of the same college hit a two-wheeler and hit the autorickshaw. In the impact, Loganathan sustained head injuries and died on the spot. Prabhu and the motorist Sundarajan sustained injuries and were admitted to Government Mohan Kumaramangalam Medical College Hospital. The body was taken to the hospital and post-mortem done and handed over to the relatives. Magudanchavadi police rushed to the spot and are on the lookout for the bus driver Sakthivel.
title: Youth killed in multiple vehicle collision
